Text.Page:
Gulas are cannibals, and their whole society is ruled by their chefs. But that doesn't mean they're picky eaters.

They're consuming the remains of our fallen comrades, good soldiers who gave everything for the federation.

That's no Dream; it's a nightmare. Recover the bodies so we can give them a proper burial.
Thank you, <PCNAME>. The Swords of Kaia have a special ceremony to honor the fallen, but it's more meaningful if we have the actual remains.
Any luck finding our fallen brethren?
